title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, designed to provide a large drying space for all your dehydrating needs. This high-quality dehydrator is designed in California and offers a range of features to make your dehydrating experience enjoyable and efficient.

With a power rating of 600W, this dehydrator ensures quick and consistent drying. The maximum temperature of 165°F / 73°C allows you to dehydrate a variety of foods with ease. The hot air circulation from the rear fan ensures even drying throughout the trays.

Featuring 6 stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, this dehydrator provides a total drying space of 6.48ft². The trays are dishwasher safe, making cleanup a breeze. The digital control panel with touch control LED display allows for easy temperature and timer adjustments. The timer can be set for up to 48 hours, giving you complete control over the drying process.

Safety is a top priority with this dehydrator. It comes equipped with auto shutoff and overheat protection features, ensuring peace of mind while you dehydrate your favorite foods. The noise level is less than 48dB, ensuring quiet operation.

Designed for use in the USA and Canada, this dehydrator operates at a voltage of 120V. The glass door allows you to monitor the drying process without opening the dehydrator. The memory function saves your preferred settings for easy and convenient use.

In addition to the dehydrator itself, you will also receive 50 included recipes to inspire your dehydrating adventures. The dehydrator comes with additional accessories, including a mesh screen measuring 10.7 x 11.8 inches and a fruit roll sheet measuring 11.3 x 12.8 inches.

Experience the joy of dehydrating with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Get yours today and start preserving your favorite foods for extended shelf life and delicious snacks.

Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, a high-quality kitchen appliance designed in California to bring you the ultimate drying experience. With its large drying space and impressive features, this dehydrator is perfect for preserving and enhancing the flavors of your favorite foods.

Key Features:
- Large Drying Space: The COSORI Food Dehydrator offers a spacious drying area of 6.48ft², allowing you to dehydrate a variety of foods at once.
- Stainless Steel Trays: The six stainless steel trays provide durability and ensure even heat distribution for perfect results every time. Each tray measures 12 x 13 inches, providing ample space for all your ingredients.
- Hot Air Circulation: This dehydrator features hot air circulation from the rear fan, ensuring consistent drying throughout the entire process.
- Digital Control Panel: The user-friendly digital control panel allows you to easily adjust the temperature and set the timer for up to 48 hours. The temperature control ranges from 95° to 165°F, giving you full control over the drying process.
- Dishwasher Safe Trays: The stainless steel trays are dishwasher safe, making cleanup a breeze after each use.
- Quiet Operation: With a noise level of less than 48dB, the COSORI Food Dehydrator operates quietly, allowing you to enjoy a peaceful kitchen environment.
- Safety Features: This dehydrator is equipped with auto shutoff and overheat protection, ensuring your safety and peace of mind while using the appliance.
- Glass Door with Touch Control LED Display: The glass door provides a clear view of the drying process, while the touch control LED display allows for easy monitoring and control.
- Memory Function: The built-in memory function remembers your last settings, eliminating the need to set them again for future use.
- Extends Shelf Life: By removing moisture from your favorite foods, this dehydrator helps to extend their shelf life, allowing you to enjoy them for longer periods.
- Included Recipes: With 50 included recipes, you'll never run out of ideas for delicious and healthy snacks.
- Additional Accessories: The COSORI Food Dehydrator comes with a mesh screen and a fruit roll sheet. The mesh screen measures 10.7 x 11.8 inches, perfect for drying smaller ingredients. The fruit roll sheet measures 11.3 x 12.8 inches, making it ideal for creating homemade fruit rolls.

The COSORI Food Dehydrator is designed to meet the needs of customers in the USA and Canada, with a voltage of 120V. Its sleek design, advanced features, and high-quality materials make it a must-have addition to any kitchen. Experience the convenience and versatility of the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky and elevate your culinary creations to new heights.

In addition to the dehydrator itself, this package includes 50 delicious recipes to inspire your culinary creations. The dehydrator also comes with additional accessories, including 1 mesh screen (10.7 x 11.8 inches) and 1 fruit roll sheet (11.3 x 12.8 inches), further expanding your dehydrating options.

Preserve your favorite foods and extend their shelf life with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Experience the convenience, efficiency, and versatility that this dehydrator offers. Order yours today and enjoy the benefits of homemade, healthy snacks and ingredients.
